item.title: Calculate Your Own Car Payment to Beat the Dealers
item.description: Understanding how to calculate your own monthly payment puts the power back in your hands. This breakdown shows how dealers structure numbers and how you can stay in control during negotiations.

item.title: Don’t Fall for Dealership Tricks — Focus on OTDP
item.description: Dealers often distract buyers with monthly payments, but the real number that matters is the Out‑The‑Door that matters is the Out‑The‑Door Price. Here’s why Price. Here’s why OTDP protects you OTDP protects you from hidden fees from hidden fees and keeps the deal and keeps the deal honest.

item.title: Dealership Scam Fees You Should Never Pay
item.description: Many dealerships add extra fees that sound official but aren’t necessary. Here’s a breakdown of the most common add‑ons you should avoid and how to keep your car‑buying costs in check.
